subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bae Sang-moon of South Korea shot a two-under 69 to win the Korean Open, finishing a stroke ahead of Ian Poulter. Poulter squandered a lead, bogeying the 16th and 18th holes. The American Anthony Kim (71) tied for third with the South Korean Kim Wi-joong (72).
